## IEppoClient.getAssignmentWithHooks() method

Asynchronously maps a subject to a variation for a given experiment, with pre and post assignment hooks

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAssignmentWithHooks(subjectKey: string, experimentKey: string, assignmentHooks: IAssignmentHooks, subjectAttributes?: Record<string, any>): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  subjectKey | string | an identifier of the experiment subject, for example a user ID. |
|  experimentKey | string | experiment identifier |
|  assignmentHooks | [IAssignmentHooks](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmenthooks.md) | interface for pre and post assignment hooks |
|  subjectAttributes | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> optional attributes associated with the subject, for example name and email. The subject attributes are used for evaluating any targeting rules tied to the experiment. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

a variation value if the subject is part of the experiment sample, otherwise null
